channel.title: CVE Feed for Hyperion -- Hyperion Web Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hyperion -- Hyperion Web Server

item.title: CVE-2024-4175|2024-04-25T11:51:36.458Z -- hyperion -- hyperion%20web%20server
item.description: Unicode transformation vulnerability in Hyperion affecting version 2.0.15. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a malicious payload with Unicode characters that will be replaced by ASCII characters.
